content.question: ​The rational function <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> is given by <math alttext="g open parentheses x close parentheses equals fraction numerator x cubed plus 1000 over denominator x squared minus 100 end fraction equals fraction numerator open parentheses x plus 10 close parentheses open parentheses x squared minus 10 x plus 100 close parentheses over denominator x squared minus 100 end fraction"><mi>g</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1000</mn></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced><mfenced><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>100</mn></mrow></mfrac></math>. Which of the following statements describes the behavior of the graph of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> ?

choices.label: ​The graph intersects the <math alttext="x"><mi>x</mi></math>-axis at <math alttext="x equals negative 10"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></math> because <math alttext="open parentheses negative 10 close parentheses cubed plus 1000 equals 0"><msup><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1000</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>.

​The graph has a hole at <math alttext="x equals negative 10"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></math> because <math alttext="open parentheses x plus 10 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> appears exactly once in the numerator and exactly once in the denominator, when both the numerator and the denominator of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> are factored.

​The graph has vertical asymptotes at <math alttext="x equals 10"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn></math> and at <math alttext="x equals negative 10"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></math> because <math alttext="10 squared minus 100 equals 0"><msup><mn>10</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math> and <math alttext="open parentheses negative 10 close parentheses squared minus 100 equals 0"><msup><mfenced><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mn>100</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>.
​The graph has no holes because the degree of the numerator is greater than the degree of the denominator.

content.answer: ​The graph has a hole at <math alttext="x equals negative 10"><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>-</mo><mn>10</mn></math> because <math alttext="open parentheses x plus 10 close parentheses"><mfenced><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfenced></math> appears exactly once in the numerator and exactly once in the denominator, when both the numerator and the denominator of <math alttext="g"><mi>g</mi></math> are factored.

skill.text: Skill 3.C: Support conclusions or choices with a logical rationale or appropriate data.
